description:
Patagonia has managed to make their Capilene® Cool softer than ever. By adding a blend of Naia™ Renew, you get the same performance and wicking the Capilene® Cool line is known for, but now it has a natural softness. The performance-knit fabric wicks sweat and moves with you for comfort in a range of temperatures. Soft, cotton like fabric has permanent odour control that's welcome when you're hitching into a trail-side town. Awesome for cross-country hiking and any hot-weather activity.

  • Light and wicking poly blend packs down small and has natural odor control
  • Naia™ Renew is a blend of renewable wood pulp and postconsumer plastics
  • miDori™ bioSoft finish improves wicking and softness
  • Set in sleeves with underarm gussets for chafe-free comfort and range of motion
  • No tags at neck for itch-free comfort
name: Patagonia Capilene Cool Trail Long Sleeve Shirt - Men's
